User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"运营分析报告"，添加页眉显示"运营部"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "运营分析报告", level=1);add_header(doc_path, "运营部");

User instruction: 添加二级标题"运营数据"、"问题分析"和"改进建议"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "运营数据", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "问题分析", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "改进建议", level=2);

User instruction: 在"运营数据"下插入一个折线图展示月度活跃用户数。
Feasible API sequence: create_line_chart(["1月", "2月", "3月", "4月", "5月", "6月"], [5000, 5500, 6000, 5800, 6200, 6500], title="月度活跃用户数", xlabel="月份", ylabel="用户数");

User instruction: 在"问题分析"下添加带编号的列表项。
Feasible API sequence: add_list_item(doc_path, "用户增长放缓", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "留存率下降", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "转化率不足", style="List Number");
